title: The Knock at the door
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: "The effort to support the war was extended to everyone."
description: War has followed Helen all her life. As a young girl, she wrote letters to her brothers overseas and she had feared losing her husband in the Vietnam war. That dreaded knock on the door was something she never wanted to hear.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
